name: ai_act_kg
description: Knowledge-graph powered assistant for exploring the EU Artificial Intelligence Act.   The repo contains the scraping pipeline that turns the legal text into structured JSON, loaders that populate a Memgraph/Neo4j instance with richly linked nodes (articles, annexes, recitals, paragraphs), and a FastAPI app that serves both a LangChain agent and a custom ReAct-style Ollama agent with Langfuse observability, a lightweight frontend, and Valkey-backed conversational memory.
